mapper.select: SELECT UUID,APPSORT,APPNAME,VERSIONCODE,VERSIONNAME,PACKAGENAME,APPTYPE,VERSIONURL,SIZE,ISUPGRADE,DESCRIPTION,ISREVIEW,CREATETIME,UPDATETIME FROM app_version_common where APPTYPE=#{appType} and VERSIONCODE=#{versionCode} and APPSORT=#{appSort} order by VERSIONCODE desc,UPDATETIME desc
